entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.32.2
entry.content:
ğŸŒŸ Changes in this release:

This release brings new features, UI improvements, and important fixes aimed at enhancing usability and maintainability across the app. - Table Column Visibility Configuration: Users can now customize which columns appear in book tables, improving personalization and focus. - Mobile Responsiveness for Metadata Tools: The metadata viewer, editor, picker, and searcher have been updated for better performance and layout on mobile devices. These components now adapt smoothly across screen sizes, continuing the commitment to responsive design. - Reset Reading Progress: Users can now reset their reading progress for any book with a simple action. - Read Status Tracking Fix: Moved read status tracking to a per-user progress entity to resolve inconsistencies in shared or multi-user environments. - Contribution Guidelines: Introduced a CONTRIBUTING.md file to help new contributors get started with setup, development practices, and how to propose changes.
